Key: All right! Time to get studying today!

Well, it's probably nothing compared to
Origami, but maybe if I study, some of her
good luck will rub off on me...
Translation:
Bueno, probablemente no sea nada comparado con
Origami, pero quizá si estudio, se me pegue
algo de su buena suerte...

Key: Heighten oneself, huh...? Yeah! Let's do it!

(Once I opened the notebook, I saw a neatly
handwritten note...)
Translation:
(Cuando abrí el cuaderno, vi una nota
pulcramente escrita a mano...)

Key: Good work with your studies. I enjoyed myself\nstudying with you, Shido. Usually I stare at you,\nbut today you stared at me. I enjoyed that, too.
Translation:
Buen trabajo con tus estudios. Disfruté estudiando contigo,
Shido. Normalmente te miro fijamente, pero hoy tú me has
mirado a mí. Eso también me ha gustado.

Key: Next time you come over, we should try\nactivities other than studying.
Translation:
La próxima vez que vengas, deberíamos intentar
otras actividades que no sean estudiar.
